column4: helo,anyone an idea to start one windows with 3 terminal inside? (for mutt,top and tail) ?
multiple tabs for one terminal will not do for you? (ctrl-shift-t)
oCean: if I can see them all?
oCean:with tabs I only see one  :-(
well, you would have to "tab" through the tabs. I think you're looking for a split screen?
you could just open multiple terminalwindows, you know?
oCean: yes
why not open multiple terminals then? I have tons of 'em open during the day..
oCean: 3 time gnome-terminal is no good solution
!info terminator | schasch, ok this might be something:
it suprises me that it do not exist (only terminator, a pythonscript)
oCean;ubottu yes, terminator...but that could not be paramerter'd
for 3 terminal and the 3 apps
oCean;ubottu: and I am not succeeding to path it(too stupid)
asked too on the IRC of terminator...not possible yet...
what do you mean?
oCean;ubottu: i mean to patch...that it starts splitted in 3 terminals
my python is not goog enough
aha, dunno about that.
oCean; dunno?
meaning don't know (sorry). Maybe this has something interesting? : http://www.64bitjungle.com/ubuntu/split-screen-gnome-terminals-with-terminator-in-ubuntu/
oCean: I google the hole day....  grrrrr...  thanks I'll have a look
ok. Good luck with that. Have to leave...
